description: Creates or updates a database's transparent data encryption configuration.

properties.description: Represents the properties of the resource.

subscription_id.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

transparent_data_encryption_name.description: The name of the transparent data encryption configuration.

parameters.description: The required parameters for creating or updating transparent data encryption.

api_version.description: The API version to use for the request.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

database_name.description: The name of the database for which setting the transparent data encryption applies.
